sources.name: PortfolioDimensionTables
sources.script:
source(output(
		DimTableName as string,
		DimID as integer,
		DimCode as string,
		DimName as string,
		DimDescription as string,
		DimActive as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> PortfolioDimensionTables

sources.name: TaxonomyDimensionTerms
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermDimTable as string,
		TermID as integer,
		TermDimID as long,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		TermDescription as string,
		TermPreferred as boolean,
		TermAvailable as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TaxonomyDimensionTerms

sources.name: LookupType
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		DimTable as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LookupType

sinks.name: SinkIntoTermTaxonomy
sinks.script:
Filter4 sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		DimID,
		TermCode = DimCode,
		TermName = DimName,
		Description = DimDescription,
		Preferred,
		Available = DimActive,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> SinkIntoTermTaxonomy

sinks.name: DeleteTerm
sinks.script:
MarkForDeletion sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID']) ~> DeleteTerm

sinks.name: UpdateSink
sinks.script:
Filter2 sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		TermCode = DimCode,
		TermName = DimName,
		Description = DimDescription,
		Available = DimActive
	)) ~> UpdateSink

transformations.name: MergeJoin
transformations.script:
PortfolioDimensionTables, TaxonomyDimensionTerms join(DimID == TermDimID
	&& DimTableName == TermDimTable,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit
transformations.script:
MergeJoin split(isNull(TermID),
	isNull(DimID),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit@(Insert, Delete, Update)

transformations.name: Lookup1
transformations.script:
DerivedColumn, LookupType lookup(DimTableName == DimTable,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1

transformations.name: SelectForInsertion
transformations.script:
Filter3 select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		DimCode,
		DimName,
		DimDescription,
		DimActive,
		TermID,
		Preferred,
		TermTypeID = LookupType@TermTypeID
	))~> SelectForInsertion

transformations.name: SelectForDeletion
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit@Delete select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		TermID,
		TermCode,
		TermName
	))~> SelectForDeletion

transformations.name: SelectForUpdate
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit@Update select(mapColumn(
		DimCode,
		DimName,
		DimDescription,
		DimActive,
		TermID
	))~> SelectForUpdate
